feature.label: Gymnast Runtime (Incubation)
feature.description:
Gymnast is a framework for jumpstarting text editors for custom Domain Specific Languages. Gymnast comprises two main parts (Runtime and Generator), each of which can in turn be divided into Core and User Interface.
Technical documentation on how to use Gymnast can be found in Ch. 1 and 2 of the technical report "Generation of Eclipse-based IDEs for Custom DSLs", to be found at http://www.sts.tu-harburg.de/%7Emi.garcia/SoC2007/draftreport.pdf
Gymnast is hosted as an EMFT component with Incubation status.
